sub_topic: Solving systems of linear equations using block matrices
message_1:
Solve the following system of linear equations using block matrices:

x + 2y + 3z = 6 
2x + 5y + 2z = 4 
4x + 3y + 8z = 10 

Write the solution in the form of a column matrix.
message_2:
To solve the given system of linear equations using block matrices, we first represent the system in the matrix form AX = B, where A is the coefficient matrix, X is the column matrix of variables, and B is the column matrix of constants.

A = | 1  2  3 |
    | 2  5  2 |
    | 4  3  8 |

X = | x |
    | y |
    | z |

B = |  6  |
    |  4  |
    | 10  |

Now, we need to find the inverse of matrix A (A_inv) and multiply it with matrix B to get the solution matrix X.

A_inv = 1/det(A) * adj(A)

First, we find the determinant of A (det(A)):

det(A) = 1(5*8 - 2*3) - 2(2*8 - 2*3) + 3(2*3 - 4*5)
       = 1(40 - 6) - 2(16 - 6) + 3(6 - 20)
       = 1(34) - 2(10) + 3(-14)
       = 34 - 20 - 42
       = -28

Now, we find the adjoint of A (adj(A)):

adj(A) = |  (5*8 - 2*3)  -(2*8 - 2*3)   (2*3 - 4*5)  |
         | -(2*8 - 2*2)   (1*8 - 3*4)  -(1*2 - 3*3)  |
         |  (2*5 - 4*2)  -(1*5 - 2*3)   (1*3 - 2*2)  |

adj(A) = |  34   -10    -14  |
         | -12    4     -7  |
         |   6    1      1  |

Now, we find the inverse of A (A_inv):

A_inv = 1/det(A) * adj(A)
      = 1/-28 * |  34   -10    -14  |
                | -12    4     -7  |
                |   6    1      1  |

Now, we multiply A_inv with B to get the solution matrix X:

X = A_inv * B
  = 1/-28 * |  34   -10    -14  | * |  6  |
            | -12    4     -7  |   |  4  |
            |   6    1      1  |   | 10  |

X = |  (34*6 - 10*4 - 14*10) / -28  |
    | (-12*6 + 4*4 - 7*10) / -28    |
    |  (6*6 + 1*4 + 1*10) / -28     |

X = |  (204 - 40 - 140) / -28  |
    | (-72 + 16 - 70) / -28    |
    |  (36 + 4 + 10) / -28     |

X = |  24 / -28  |
    | -126 / -28 |
    |  50 / -28  |

X = | -6/7  |
    |  9/2  |
    | -25/7 |

So, the solution in the form of a column matrix is:

X = | -6/7  |
    |  9/2  |
    | -25/7 |
